title: leagueclient.exe - Bad image
body: I have just tried to launch league but this came up  can someone plz help  C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\api - ms - crt - stdio - l1 -1 -0.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error

replies.body:
We've seen this issue when something goes wrong during the installation process. You should be able to resolve this by completing a clean reinstall using [**this guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)

Let me know if this worked.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zZIQqYMd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-20T03:38:26.571+0000)
>
> We've seen this issue when something goes wrong during the installation process. You should be able to resolve this by completing a clean reinstall using [**this guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)
> 
> Let me know if this worked.

Hey Targon, this happens to me every day pretty much and it's getting really irritating. I have to uninstall and reinstall every day just to play! What to do?
